title: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706: The BidiUtil class in win32 is currently using Class.forName() method.
OB: The current bug report does not mention the observed behavior.
EB: Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class. Currently, there are no non-static methods in this class, so it would be a good practice to have a private constructor to prevent unnecessary instantiation. This change will not increase the size as the compiler already provides a default public constructor.
SR: To address the issue, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4); It is recommended to test the solution to ensure it functions as expected.
